response.overview: Talented USO entertainer Dixie Leonard and comedian Eddie Sparks deal with their relationship over the course of 5 decades from World War II to the Vietnam War era to their twilight era in the 90's.
response.tagline: Laughter and tears. Tragedy and triumph. They lived it all. For the boys.
response.title: For the Boys

titles.title: For the Boys - Tage des Ruhms, Tage der Liebe
